name: Hudson Technologies, Inc.
description: Hudson Technologies, Inc. is a leading provider of innovative refrigerant products and services that promote environmental sustainability and energy efficiency. Established in 1991 and headquartered in Pearl River, New York, Hudson focuses on the recovery, reclamation, and resale of refrigerants, which are critical for the HVACR (Heating, Ventilation, Air Conditioning, and Refrigeration) industry. The company is committed to reducing the environmental impact of refrigerants by providing comprehensive solutions for refrigerant management. Hudson provides a range of services including refrigerant recovery, on-site services, and analytical services to ensure compliance with environmental regulations. Additionally, Hudson plays a crucial role in the transition to alternative refrigerants and technologies that are less harmful to the ozone layer and global warming. The company's extensive experience and innovative approach position it as a trusted partner for businesses aiming to improve their environmental footprint while maintaining operational efficiency. Hudson Technologies is dedicated to enhancing the sustainability of the HVACR industry through its cutting-edge products, which include a variety of refrigerants, and its commitment to environmental stewardship is evident in its operational practices and community initiatives.
